pullrequest.title: Support setting the user camera clip distance via the GUI

content.raw:
compilation fails:

~~~
gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:761:14: error: no member named 'SetFarClip' in 'gazebo::rendering::UserCamera'
        cam->SetFarClip(cam->NearClip(), this->dataPtr->variantManager->value(
        ~~~  ^
1 error generated.
~~~
